Saturday, July 4 at 8:30 and 9:30pm

A Capitol Fourth

Co-hosted by John Stamos and Vanessa Williams, this 40th anniversary event features Patti LaBelle, John Fogerty, Renée Fleming, Trace Adkins, Andy Grammer, Yolanda Adams, Brantley Gilbert, Lauren Alaina, The Temptations, Chrissy Metz, Brian Stokes Mitchell, Kelli O'Hara, Mandy Gonzalez, and Maestro Jack Everly conducting the NSO.
